value:
You remind me of someone I
hate. I'll probably kill you like
I killed them.

There's nothing more fun than
causing pain and death. The more
blood I spill, the better!

You lowly creatures speak incessantly
of peace, but you love slaughter as
much as I do! Embrace it!

Did you say something? I wasn't
paying attention. I was thinking about
worms slowly eating you to death.

Heroes are such ghastly nuisances.
I would love to just squash them all
like the pests they are.

Your place is as clean and inviting
as $Nf's.
How boring.

I've made such progress, even Thales
will have to be impressed!

When you have power, there's only
one thing to do... Use it!
No! I am not this pathetic!
A new way to kill vermin, perhaps?

My name is Kronya. I assume you
summoned me to kill you? I'll be sure
to make it as painful as possible!

Just the sight of your face makes me
so angry! Can I kill you now, just to
get it over with? Please?$k$pGah! Why not? It would be easy.
You're such a weak creature that
I'd hardly have to lift a finger.$k$pFighting alongside you, sharing our
victories and defeats... I'm beginning
to feel attached to you.$k$pI don't know why. I'm an Agarthan,
and you're just a pathetic little worm.
It's unthinkable. It's repulsive!$k$pBut that's how I feel. So if you won't
let me kill you, you'll have to agree to
be my plaything. Forever. All right?
ええいっ！
キャハハ！
きゃああっ！
生意気…！
Just a nuisance!
You fool!
You're in my way!
Guess you wanna die?
How could I lose...?
キャハッ
Don't get too chummy!
Gah! Don't surprise me like that!
So much death... How exciting!
I love the sight of blood. I don't expect filthy vermin like you to understand that.
I hate the smell of lowly beasts.
I wonder if Thales is angry with me...
How much longer till I can stab someone?
Yeah yeah.
Time to kill?
Okaaay!
